mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEETING (user_id, category, subject, context, total_member, file_name, DEADLINE_TIME) VALUES (#{userId}, #{category}, #{subject}, #{context}, #{totalMember}, #{fileUploadUrl}, #{deadLineTime})
mapper.select: SELECT meeting_id FROM MEETING WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY meeting_id DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: insert into user_meeting (user_id, meeting_id, user_type) values (#{userId}, #{meetingId}, #{userType})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_meeting SET user_type = CASE WHEN user_type = 'WAIT' THEN 'FOLLOWER' WHEN user_type = 'FOLLOWER' THEN 'WAIT' END WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND meeting_id = #{meetingId}

UPDATE meeting SET PRESENT_MEMBER = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_meeting WHERE meeting_id = #{meetingId}), status = CASE WHEN TOTAL_MEMBER = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_meeting WHERE meeting_id = #{meetingId}) AND status = 'CONTINUE' THEN 'FINISH' WHEN TOTAL_MEMBER > (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_meeting WHERE meeting_id = #{meetingId}) AND status = 'FINISH' THEN 'CONTINUE' ELSE status -- ELSE 절 추가하여 기본 값을 유지 END WHERE meeting_id = #{meetingId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.meeting_id as meeting_id, um.user_id, m.region_id, m.category, m.subject, m.context, m.total_member, m.present_member, m.file_name, m.status, m.reg_dt, m.DEADLINE_TIME, um.user_meeting_id, um.user_id, u.user_name, um.meeting_id as um_meeting_id, um.user_type FROM meeting m LEFT JOIN user_meeting um ON m.meeting_id = um.meeting_id LEFT JOIN users u ON um.user_id = u.user_id WHERE m.meeting_id = #{meetingId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN um.user_type = 'LEADER' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, um.user_id
select um.user_meeting_id, u.user_id, u.user_name, um.meeting_id, um.user_type from users u join USER_MEETING um on u.user_id = um.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and um.meeting_id = #{meetingId}

select u.user_id as user_id, u.user_name as user_name, c.room_id as room_id, us.user_id as writeUserId, us.user_name as writeUserName, c.message, c.message_send_date as writeTime from chat c left join (select user_id, user_name from users where user_id = #{userId}) u on 1 = 1 left join users us on c.user_id = us.user_id where room_id = ( select ROOM_ID as room_id from room where meeting_id = #{meetingId} ) order by message_send_date
